Sad thing is: it's happening right now.

comments_since_last_sample.body: This reminds me of a Philip K Dick Novel, I think it was Do Androids Dream of Electric sheep, which Blade Runner was based on, but in the novel it was so hot outside that the heat would literally kill anyone who wasn't inside an air conditioned building during certain hours of the day. I forget if he ever mentioned how hot it was, or when this took place. But thinking about it is making me want to visit the book again. And I'd suggest everyone else follow suit if you're even remotely interested in Sci-Fi. Though if you're gonna give Philip K Dick a try for the first time, I'd VERY STRONGLY suggest starting with UBIK. It's an outstanding read. And not too heavy at all.
